forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
This morning in Downtown San Francisco greets us with mostly sunny skies, though a gentle veil of cloud cover lingers, hinting at the brood of the Pacific. As the sun climbs higher, the temperatures will dance between the mid-60s, dipping slightly in the afternoon, while a light breeze invokes a pleasant chill. The wind whispers softly from the west-southwest between 2 to 14 mph, creating a soothing backdrop to the city’s urban melody.

Though the forecast hints at a fading marine layer, it seems the coastline remains close, a soft embrace of fog still coaxing the Golden Gate. Residents and visitors alike may want to don layers, perhaps a light sweater or a compact jacket, especially as dusk approaches, when the crisp air begins to settle in. For those inclined, a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or a visit to a local café could provide joy. The charm of this morning, with its clear visibility juxtaposed against the threat of evening mists, invites a reflective pace, one where one might sip a warm brew while absorbing the vibrant tableau of the city.
